actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation

official_title: To redesignate Mammoth Peak in Yosemite National Park as "Mount Jessie Benton Fre'mont".

summary.text: Designates Mammoth Peak in Yosemite National Park as "Mount Jessie Benton Fremont" to be informally known as "Mt. Jessie," in honor of her contributions toward the approval of the Yosemite Grant (the land grant under which the Yosemite Valley and the Mariposa Big Tree Grove in California were granted to the state of California by the federal government for their preservation and public use).

titles.title: To redesignate Mammoth Peak in Yosemite National Park as "Mount Jessie Benton Fre'mont".
